consoleAssert.description: If the specified expression is false, the message is written to the console along with a stack trace

consoleCount.description: Writes the the number of times that count() has been invoked at the same line and with the same label

consoleDir.description: Prints a JavaScript representation of the specified object

consoleError.description: Displays a message in the console and also includes a stack trace from where the method was called

consoleGroup.description: Groups and indents all following output by an additional level, until console.groupEnd() is called.

consoleLog.description: Displays a message in the console

consoleTrace.description: Prints a stack trace from the point where the method was called

consoleLogJson.description: Logs stringified JSON property with name.

consoleWarn.description: Displays a message in the console but also displays a yellow warning icon along with the logged message

consoleInfo.description: Displays a message in the console but also displays a blue information icon along with the logged message

import { Route, Switch, NavLink, Link } from 'react-router-dom'

propTypeNode.description: Anything that can be rendered: numbers, strings, elements or an array

propTypeNodeRequired.description: Anything that can be rendered: numbers, strings, elements or an array required

propTypeInstanceOf.description: Is an instance of a class prop type

propTypeInstanceOfRequired.description: Is an instance of a class prop type required

propTypeEnum.description: Prop type limited to specific values by treating it as an enum

propTypeEnumRequired.description: Prop type limited to specific values by treating it as an enum required

propTypeOneOfType.description: An object that could be one of many types

propTypeOneOfTypeRequired.description: An object that could be one of many types required

propTypeArrayOf.description: An array of a certain type

propTypeArrayOfRequired.description: An array of a certain type required

propTypeObjectOf.description: An object with property values of a certain type

propTypeObjectOfRequired.description: An object with property values of a certain type required

propTypeShape.description: An object taking on a particular shape

propTypeShapeRequired.description: An object taking on a particular shape required

propTypeExact.description: An object with warnings on extra properties

propTypeExactRequired.description: An object with warnings on extra properties required

method.description: Creates a method inside a class

propertyGet.description: Creates a getter property inside a class

propertySet.description: Creates a setter property inside a class

forOf.description: Iterating over property names of iterable objects

forIn.description: Iterating over property values of iterable objects

destructingObject.description: Creates and assigns a local variable using object destructing

destructingArray.description: Creates and assigns a local variable using array destructing

setInterval.description: Executes the given function at specified intervals

setTimeOut.description: Executes the given function after the specified delay

promise.description: Creates and returns a new Promise in the standard ES7 syntax

destructProps.description: Creates and assigns a local variable using props destructing

destructState.description: Creates and assigns a local variable using state destructing

classConstructor.description: Adds a default constructor for it('', () => {})the class that contains props as arguments

emptyState.description: Creates empty state object. To be used in a constructor.

componentDidMount.description: Invoked once, only on the client (not on the server), immediately after the initial rendering occurs.

shouldComponentUpdate.description: Invoked before rendering when new props or state are being received.

componentDidUpdate.description: Invoked immediately after the component's updates are flushed to the DOM.

componentWillUnmount.description: Invoked immediately before a component is unmounted from the DOM.

getDerivedStateFromProps.description: Invoked right before calling the render method, both on the initial mount and on subsequent updates.

getSnapshotBeforeUpdate.description: Called right before mutations are made (e.g. before the DOM is updated)

createRef.description: Create ref statement used inside constructor

componentSetStateObject.description: Performs a shallow merge of nextState into current state

componentSetStateFunc.description: Performs a shallow merge of nextState into current state
